Title: The Goldberg Girls
Writer: Adam F. Goldberg (created by), Marc Firek, Lauren Bans (executive story editor), Matt Mira (executive story editor), Erik Weiner (executive story editor), Aaron Kaczander (executive story editor)
Actors: Wendi McLendon-Covey, Sean Giambrone, Troy Gentile, Hayley Orrantia
Plot: Beverly creates her own mom group, while Erica reaches a breaking point with Geoff.
